Package org.lgdcloudsim.record

Class SqlRecordSimple

java.lang.Object
org.lgdcloudsim.record.SqlRecordSimple
All Implemented Interfaces:
SqlRecord
public class SqlRecordSimple extends Object implements SqlRecord
It is an implementation of the SqlRecord interface. It records the simulation information through the SQLite database.
Since:
LGDCloudSim 1.0
Author:
Anonymous

It records the instance id, the id of the instance group where the instance belongs, the id of the user request where the instance belongs, the cpu, the ram, the storage, the bandwidth, the lifecycle, the retry times, the data center id where the instance is created, the host id where the instance is created and the start time.
      Specified by:
      recordInstancesCreateInfo in interface SqlRecord

    • close

      public void close()
      Description copied from interface: SqlRecord
      Close the SQLite database.
      Specified by:

    • createUserRequestTable

      private void createUserRequestTable() throws SQLException
      Create the user request table. The user request table has the following columns:
      • id: int, primary key. It records the id of the user request.
      • belongDc: int. It records the id of the data center where the user request belongs.
      • submitTime: double. It records the submit time of the user request.
      • finishTime: double. It records the finish time of the user request.
      • instanceGroupNum: int. It records the number of the instance groups of the user request.
      • state: char(10). It records the state of the user request.
      • failReason: char(100). It records the fail reason of the user request.
      Throws:
      SQLException - the SQL exception

    • createInstanceGroupTable

      private void createInstanceGroupTable() throws SQLException
      Create the instance group table. The instance group table has the following columns:
      • id: int, primary key. It records the id of the instance group.
      • userRequestId: int. It records the id of the user request where the instance group belongs.
      • retryTimes: int. It records the retry times of the instance group.
      • receivedDc: int. It records the id of the data center where the instance group is received.
      • receivedTime: double. It records the receiving time of the instance group.
      • finishTime: double. It records the finish time of the instance group.
      • instanceNum: int. It records the number of the instances of the instance group.
      Throws:
      SQLException - the SQL exception

    • createGroupGraphTable

      private void createGroupGraphTable() throws SQLException
      Create the instance group graph table. The instance group graph table has the following columns:
      • srcInstanceGroupId: int. It records the id of the source instance group.
      • dstInstanceGroupId: int. It records the id of the destination instance group.
      • srcDcId: int. It records the id of the source data center.
      • dstDcId: int. It records the id of the destination data center.
      • bw: double. It records the bandwidth of the instance group edge allocated.
      • startTime: double. It records the start time of the instance group graph.
      • finishTime: double. It records the finish time of the instance group graph.
      Throws:
      SQLException - the SQL exception

    • createInstanceTable

      private void createInstanceTable() throws SQLException
      Create the instance table. The instance table has the following columns:
      • id: int, primary key. It records the id of the instance.
      • instanceGroupId: int. It records the id of the instance group where the instance belongs.
      • userRequestId: int. It records the id of the user request where the instance belongs.
      • cpu: int. It records the cpu of the instance.
      • ram: int. It records the ram of the instance.
      • storage: int. It records the storage of the instance.
      • bw: int. It records the bandwidth of the instance.
      • lifeTime: int. It records the life time of the instance.
      • retryTimes: int. It records the retry times of the instance.
      • datacenter: int. It records the id of the data center where the instance is received.
      • host: int. It records the id of the host where the instance is placed.
      • startTime: double. It records the start time of the instance.
      • finishTime: double. It records the finish time of the instance.
      Throws:
      SQLException - the SQL exception

    • createConflictTable

      private void createConflictTable() throws SQLException
      Create the conflict table. The conflict table has the following columns:
      • time: double, primary key. It records the time.
      • conflictSum: int. It records the sum of the conflicts at the time.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • createInterScheduleCostTimeTable

      private void createInterScheduleCostTimeTable() throws SQLException
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • recordConflict

      public void recordConflict(double time, int sum)
      Description copied from interface: SqlRecord
      Record the conflict information.
      Specified by:
      recordConflict in interface SqlRecord
      Parameters:
      time - the time.
      sum - the sum of the conflicts.
